name: Anjo
bio: Anjo is a gentle soul with a calm demeanor. He excels in groundwork and has shown great potential for therapeutic programs. His patient nature makes him perfect for beginners.

name: Jalisco
bio: Jalisco brings elegance and grace to everything he does. With his striking appearance and willing attitude, he's ready to find his forever home.

name: Savannah
bio: A trauma survivor who has found peace at The Horse Project. Savannah now serves as a gentle teacher, helping participants learn about trust and healing.

name: Diego
bio: Diego was wild-born and rescued from a difficult situation. His journey from fear to trust is an inspiration to everyone who meets him.

name: Ruby
bio: Ruby is the undisputed leader of the herd. Her wisdom and confident presence help maintain peace among all the horses. She's been with us the longest.

name: Greyson
bio: A former racehorse who has successfully transitioned to a calmer life. Greyson is intelligent and eager to please, making him a wonderful companion.

name: Ms. Jackie Blue
bio: Ms. Jackie Blue found her forever home in 2023! She now lives on a beautiful ranch with a loving family who adores her spotted coat and playful personality.
